CustomField.description: The Active Directory username for this user. This is not from a feed, but is derived from the Salesforce Username in the userhelper.checkEbsUsername() method.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The Active Directory username for this user. This is not from a feed, but is derived from the Salesforce Username in the userhelper.checkEbsUsername() method.
CustomField.label: AD Username
